summary: A simple file allowing you to craft Psijic or Psiijic robes/hood/gloves/boots from a forge.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5]NOTE: CRAFTABLE PSIJIC HAS BEEN BUNDLED INTO MY NEWER MOD, \"ACTUALIZE APPAREL.\"

IF YOU WANT TO DOWNLOAD THE NEWEST VERSION OF THIS MOD, FOLLOW THIS LINK:[/b][/size]
[size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8772]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8772[/url][/size]

I love the Psijic set\'s design, and was heartbroken for its not being included in the game.

So, soon as I was able, I designed a mod to include it in the game, craftable from the forge. This is my first mod of this type, and I\'m honestly surprised it works as well as it does. 

Enjoy!

Consider using this with my Psijic set recolor, No More Banana Robes.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7665
author: wetsail
